ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards]
ygData.msgSnippet: /cheer I noticed this as well. Kind of strange that we beat upon it like a drum. /shrug Also I ve noticed in Rathe Mtns, that the hill giants now start to run
ygData.messageBody:
/cheer I noticed this as well. Kind of strange that we beat upon it like a
drum. /shrug

Also I've noticed in Rathe Mtns, that the hill giants now start to run when
they are low on health. Makes it a little easier to ensure that we are
charming the victor.

Lastly, has anyone noticed a difference in our running style? It seems to
me that it has smoothed out, but since I was bumping up and down in the
swamp, I couldn't be certain. Just interested if anyone else noticed a
difference.

----Windleaf Mistsong

At 07:25 AM 9/20/00 -0700, Bobby wrote:

>Since I havn't seen it posted ill let yall know of a small but ( for me at
>least) a very cool bard change:
>
>Nostrolo Tamborine now has the outward look of a TAMBORINE.
>
>The instrament internal graphic is still of a hand drum and you still
>strum a lute when playing a percussion instrament.
>
>
>
>Tuldar Missednote
>53rd Level Woodelf Bard
>Tarew Marr.
